channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Behavioral Emergency; INC#1412; 06:50PM; WB 105 Fwy x W Imperial Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nci6x8; #Westchester; LAFD is working closely with LAPD to help an agitated patient who is at risk of falling/jumping from the 105 Freeway East of Nash St. Motorists, please avoid the area. To assure patient and responder safety, several roadways in the vicinity will be closed. Traffic will be impacted for an unknown duration.; FS 95; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC4 E205 E295 E5 E51 E95 EM13 RA64 RA95 T5 T95; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0942; 01:59PM; 4719 S 8th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RtUsP6; #HydePark; Thirty-two firefighters arrived to the two-story four-plex with heavy fire in one first floor unit. Crews quickly developed a hose line and entered the burning structure to extinguish the flames in 12 minutes (declared by radio at 1:59 PM). One patient with a minor medical complaint was evaluated on scene and released. No other injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E266 E294 E34 E66 E94 RA26 RA846 RA866 SQ21 T66 T94; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Technical Rescue; INC#0868; 02:10PM; 5420 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1NcAI; #EastHollywood; Firefighters set up a rope rescue system, suspended over the tip of the fire truck's aerial ladder, and rescued an injured worker (approximately 40-year-old male) from below grade. Paramedics secured the man to the rigid basket, and he was lifted to street level for ambulance transport with moderate injuries. Nothing further.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E82 RA27 RA82 T27 UR27; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0942; 01:47PM; 4719 S 8th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RtUsP6; #HydePark; Two-story four-plex with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E266 E294 E34 E66 E94 RA26 RA846 RA866 SQ21 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Technical Rescue; INC#0868; 01:05PM; 5420 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1NcAI; #EastHollywood; One worker was below grade level working, and fell approximately 6 feet. The worker is injured and unable to climb out of that location. Paramedics are with the worker now. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue (USAR) specialists are responding to perform a basket rescue using a rope system over the tip of the aerial ladder.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E82 RA82 T27 UR27; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0128; 03:33AM; 1000 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aeD60n; #Downtown; 56 Firefighters took just 37 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within a vacant & boarded 7,400 square foot two-story office building, the site of a significant fire three days earlier. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E11 E20 E203 E211 E220 E3 E4 EA1 EM1 RA20 RA3 RA803 SO1 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 12, 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0128; 02:56AM; 1000 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aeD60n; #Downtown; PRELIM: Offensive firefighting operations at a two-story office building, the site of a previous fire.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E11 E20 E203 E211 E220 E3 E4 EM1 RA20 RA3 RA803 SO1 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 12/03/2023 INC#0300

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0300; 01:05PM; 13755 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/413JOly; #Sylmar; As Firefighters continue to systematically search the three unstable structures on the 1.6 acre parcel that were heavily damaged by fire, they have discovered an adult female deceased on the premises, bringing the current death total to two adult civilians. The earlier discovered decedent's age and gender have yet to be confirmed. An LAFD Human Remains Detection Canine has completed its search of the scene, and no additional civilian or responder injuries have been reported. LAFD and LAPD personnel continue to work in close coordination under a Unified Command as Los Angeles Fire Department Investigators seek the specific cause of the fire. The Los Angeles Police Department will be serving as the lead agency in the overall and ongoing incident investigation, working with the Medical Examiner's office, as that agency seeks to positively identify the decedents, as well as the specific cause, time and manner of their death.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 AR12 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E89 E91 E98 EA1 EM14 EM15 HR3 K902 PH1 PI1 RA18 RA889 RA89 RA891 RA91 SO1 SQ87 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 12/03/2023 INC#0300

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0300; 08:30AM; 13755 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/413JOly; #Sylmar; LAFD Firefighters carefully examining the three structures heavily damaged by fire, have discovered weapons, ammunition and the remains of one person (undetermined age / gender / site affiliation) in the debris. No other injuries have been reported. As the three heavily damaged and structurally unstable buildings have been formally 'red-tagged' by the City's Department of Building & Safety as unfit for entry, LAFD crews will be working throughout the day alongside fire cause investigators, police officials and the Medical Examiner to assure hazard abatement that allows for a safe, thorough and methodical investigation of the fire scene, and removal of the decedent. LAFD and LAPD first responders remain deeply grateful to neighbors who quickly came forth at the time of the fire to share insight, observations and concerns, which allowed Firefighters and Police Officers to take immediate and effective action that protected neighbors, adjacent homes and emergency response personnel. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Erik Scott remains at scene to assist the media.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E89 E91 E98 EA1 EM14 EM15 HR3 K902 PH1 PI1 RA18 RA889 RA89 RA891 RA91 SO1 SQ87 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0300; 05:59AM; 13755 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/413JOly; Sylmar; KNOCKDOWN: While remaining in a defensive position due to heavy ammunition going off, firefighters were able to extinguish the fire in all three structures in one hour and 11 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews will work to address hot spots without entering the structure. LAPD Bomb Squad is responding to assess the situation for further actions. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. LAFD PIO CII Erik Scott is responding for media availability. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E89 E91 E98 EA1 EM14 EM15 HR3 PI1 RA18 RA889 RA89 RA891 RA91 SO1 SQ87 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart
